title: Charlie Kirk LIVE with Kari Lake
itunes:title: Charlie Kirk LIVE with Kari Lake
description:
The eyes of America are on Arizona. The Grand Canyon State's elections are the most important in the country, and Kari Lake is the GOP's most exciting candidate. Kari Lake joins Charlie on-stage in Chandler, Arizona to explain why her campaign has succeeded through courage rather than cowardice, and to lay out the stakes of the most important midterms of our lives: Whether our border will be protected from invasion and whether our children will be protected from medical experimentation.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
